title: How do I extend the battery life？
answer:
1、Press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111114162549.PNG) to lock the screen when you do not use the phone.  
2、Set the screen timeout to the smallest value: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111114162559.PNG) > Settings > Display > Screen timeout.  
3、Set the screen brightness to a lower degree: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111114162610.PNG) > Settings > Display > Brightness.  
4、Turn off Bluetooth and Wi-Fi: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111114162623.PNG) > Settings > Wireless & networks and deselect Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.  
5、Disable background data synchronization: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111114162635.PNG) > Settings > Accounts & sync and deselect Background data and Auto-sync.  
6、Disable data services: Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111114162647.PNG) > Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks and deselect Data enabled.  
7、Disable GPS: Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111114162706.PNG)> Settings > Location & security and deselect Use GPS satellites.  
8、Use only 2G networks: Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111114162720.PNG)> Settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks and select Use only 2G networks.
